summary: The diff only modifies `project_state.json` (project metadata) and does not show any frontend code/config or static asset changes required to replace the header logo image. It also introduces/records a branding feature that includes adding the logo to the footer, which conflicts with the BuildRequest non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the header logo element (XPath: /html/body/div/div/header/div/a/img) so it always renders the user-provided Linex Automation logo served from `/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png` and does not display `/assets/generated/linex-logo.dim_512x512.png`.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes are shown to `frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeader.tsx`, `frontend/src/config/branding.ts`, or the static asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`. Only `project_state.json` was modified.

hallucinated_features.description: A feature description that includes updating branding across the app and adding the logo to the footer branding area.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states a non-goal: do not change footer branding/logo placement or any other UI elements beyond the selected header logo . The diff shows a feature entry describing footer logo changes.
